players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I investigated her last night and she is the mafioso. Vote Diana."
You: "Since there is no conclusive evidence against either of them, I suggest we vote for Alice's killer instead. We don't know who killed her last night."
Diana: "Bob, Alice was killed by the mafia. Charlie is the mafia. I am the detective. Your vote for anyone else helps Charlie win."
Charlie: "Bob, Diana's claim is impossible. Only one detective exists. If she were detective, she'd know I'm town. Her accusation proves she's mafia trying to frame me."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
